sourcesContent:
import Decimal from "decimal.js"

let poolAddr = "TPnwN7ph2NW4LGVb3uAQqCeRrv8H9xr9qf" //pool contract
let baseTokenAddr = "TWh5Tyx68o4zKqAqyqr6mY1vXcZmL8c51m" //the reward token

let uniAddrs = [
  "TSS89kdrcekgmErvaFv73raFiQePwnun8Z", //tefi
  "TR7NHqjeKQxGTCi8q8ZY4pL8otSzgjLj6t", //usdt
  "TVbTu1dVwwcJ4zVNwKdU98aSWkxHWD94jb", //tefi-trx
  "TEbKj6dFUSs6Q6dW5F9R4DZwTWKV9EV2BR", //slm
  "TGbu32VEGpS4kDmjrmn5ZZJgUyHQiaweoq", //pearl
  "TRX", //trx
  "TYoZt51oT8ceAZ9iuX6i4vZLY2KJvc4myF", //sso
  "place-holder", //place holder for 50% reduce
  "place-holder-for-sso-trx", //place holder for sso-trx
]

let defaultDecimals = new Decimal(10).pow(18)
let trc20USDTDecimals = new Decimal(10).pow(6)

const rewardPerBlock = "0.079516934622170000"
const startBlock = 23527500

const halfStartBlock = 23728715
const halfRewardPerBlock = "0.039758467311085000"

const  maxReward = 24000

function LPTokenToPoolID(lpAddr) {
  return uniAddrs.indexOf(lpAddr);
}

export {
  poolAddr,
  baseTokenAddr,
  uniAddrs,
  defaultDecimals,
  trc20USDTDecimals,

  rewardPerBlock,
  startBlock,

  halfStartBlock,
  halfRewardPerBlock,

  maxReward,
  LPTokenToPoolID,
}
